name: 高质量录屏
command: {"start": "hdc shell screenrecord --bit-rate 8000000 /data/local/tmp/hq_screen_{timestamp}.mp4", "stop": "hdc shell pkill -SIGINT screenrecord", "export": "hdc file recv /data/local/tmp/hq_screen_{timestamp}.mp4 ./hq_screen_{timestamp}.mp4"}

name: 设备录屏
command: {"start": "hdc shell screenrecord /data/local/tmp/screen_{timestamp}.mp4", "stop": "hdc shell pkill -SIGINT screenrecord", "export": "hdc file recv /data/local/tmp/screen_{timestamp}.mp4 ./screen_{timestamp}.mp4"}

name: 自定义录屏
command: {"start": "hdc shell screenrecord --bit-rate {bitrate} --time-limit {duration} /data/local/tmp/custom_screen_{timestamp}.mp4", "stop": "hdc shell pkill -SIGINT screenrecord", "export": "hdc file recv /data/local/tmp/custom_screen_{timestamp}.mp4 ./custom_screen_{timestamp}.mp4"}

name: 设备录屏
command: {"start": "hdc shell screenrecord /data/local/tmp/screen_{timestamp}.mp4", "stop": "hdc shell pkill -SIGINT screenrecord", "export": "hdc file recv /data/local/tmp/screen_{timestamp}.mp4 ./screen_{timestamp}.mp4"}

name: 设备录屏
command: {"start": "hdc shell screenrecord /data/local/tmp/screen_{timestamp}.mp4", "stop": "hdc shell pkill -SIGINT screenrecord", "export": "hdc file recv /data/local/tmp/screen_{timestamp}.mp4 ./screen_{timestamp}.mp4"}

name: 设备录屏
command: {"start": "hdc shell screenrecord /data/local/tmp/screen_{timestamp}.mp4", "stop": "hdc shell pkill -SIGINT screenrecord", "export": "hdc file recv /data/local/tmp/screen_{timestamp}.mp4 ./screen_{timestamp}.mp4"}
